title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Concorde - Managing the fuel-system
description:
In this video we will have a closer look at the fuel-system of the Concorde aircraft from DC Design. A new version has been made available which now also ensure the aircraft will work with the latest Sim Update so it is critical to ensure you have installed that one to make sure you can use the fuel-system correctly.

After having a look a how the tanks are interconnected, how you can manage the fuel quantity in the thanks and how the fuel flows we will take off and start reviewing how we can use the trim tanks to move the Center of Graphite (CoG) the aircraft. This is just one of the steps, but a crucial one, to make sure you can fly with the maximum speed. 

If you would like to try Concorde yourself download it from the site below:
https://www.justflight.com/product/dc-designs-concorde-microsoft-flight-simulator
